attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs who claimed for "phantom" mortgages on expenses should be investigated by the police and prosecuted if warranted.
MPs that have committed a crime with their expenses claims should "face the full force of the law.
The word sorry should not be taken in for consideration, and just standing down is not good enough.
We need an independent body to look into this situation, and if needs be use the full force of the law to investigate, and punish these Mps

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
